question:
Question: At the initial position, you are asked to navigate to a red car at the edge of a residential area ahead. Is the destination within sight at your current location? If yes, where is the destination in the view?  
choose:  
A. I see the red car on the left side of my field of view.  
B. I see the red car in the center of my field of view.  
C. I see the red car in the lower right corner of my field of view.  
D. I do not see the red car in my field of view.  
E. I see the red car on the right side of my field of view.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: A; Reason: The red car is visible on the left side of the field of view, parked along the roadside.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(0:59, 1:16)]
Option: [A]
Reason: From 0:59 to 1:16, the red car is visible on the left side of the field of view, parked along the roadside.
textgrad_result.final_answer: Option: A; Reason: The red car is visible on the left side of the field of view, parked along the roadside.
